subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: As for dealing with recent scandals bedeviling FIFA, the governing body of world soccer, its president, Sepp Blatter, on Friday offered no clear solutions, but more committees to study the problems.
snippet: As for dealing with recent scandals bedeviling FIFA, the governing body of world soccer, its president, Sepp Blatter, on Friday offered no clear solutions, but more committees to study the problems.
